dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I see... when you say you just avoided whatever felt wrong with "a hunch", you were reflexively identifying the threat by reading the room and connecting it to your intuitive experiences.
Aha, you were using Miss Daiyu's anxious breathing to clue you in...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... So this is how you managed to survive for so long.
Listen carefully, Xichun. I know that the Adepts of each Heishou will come to your aid with a flick of your wrist,
and I know that your residence, Nuanxiangwu, will be engineered by the best craftsmen to become a safe fortress stocked to the brim with all kinds of useful Boluses to protect your life.
Even still, there will come a day when you start to feel this creeping sensation whose origin you can't identify. And when it does, I hope you won't brush off that sensation as nothing.
Jia Xichun whipped around away from Hong Lu as if to express dissatisfaction, but...
... her softened expression told me that she was glad to see him worried.
